name: Overrun (en)
description:
Overrun

The year is 2050. Megacorporations rule the world and deckers access the Matrix through a datajack and a cyberdeck.

Overrun is an RPG based on the Shadowrun universe (FASA, 1989). The objective is to complete missions of sabotage and data extraction from corporate systems. Overrun has a random mission generator as well as a main story.

This is a remake of a game I made in 1996 using QBASIC. This version has a turn-based combat mechanic and extended dialogue.

How to play:

Arrow keys to move/attack.

Requirements:

Minimum resolution of 640 x 480 (landscape). Your browser must allow the use of cookies on this website.

Support:

Support this creator with a donation: https://janosbiro.itch.io/overrun-en/donate
